data.name: Conbunn Cardboard
data.detailed_description:
CARDBOARD WALK!

A relaxed platformer to hop around while collecting lost CDs for Connie, a well-known DJ. Help the bunny to recover them while exploring cardboard and paper environments!

No need to hurry though, take your time and enjoy the island as you prefear!

FEATURES

  • Explore areas like Paint Hills, Cutout Forest or Paper Bay, among others!
  • Unlock skins for the bun with your progress!
  • Over 40 CDs to collect with unique illustrations!
  • Several Sub-Areas with minigames and platforming challenges!
  • Cute Bunns!

BUN BUN CONBUNN!

Connie is a well-known DJ in Cardbun Island. Her artistic name is Conbunn! Cell, a short bird and a friend of her had lost the CDs she needed before a concert she had! Collect a good amount of them and reach the top to perform that night session!

data.short_description: A chill and cozy platformer. Hop around collecting the lost CDs of a cute DJ in this land made of cardboard!
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD 3020e
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
